00037 #include "../common/common.h"
00038 #include <vector>
00039 #include "../common/poptmx.h"
00040 
00041 using namespace std;
00042 
00043 
00045 struct clargs {
00046   string command;               
00047   string sinogram_name;         
00048   vector<string> inlist;        
00049   unsigned index;               
00050   bool beverbose;                               
00051   bool SaveInt;                                 
00052 
00054   clargs(int argc, char *argv[]);
00055 };
00056 
00057 
00058 clargs::
00059 clargs(int argc, char *argv[]) :
00060   beverbose(false),
00061   SaveInt(false),
00062   index(0)
00063 {
00064 
00065   poptmx::OptionTable table
00066         ("Prepares sinogram from the stack of files.",
00067          "Reads once certain line from all input images in the order they"
00068          " appear in the argument list and forms the sinogram from the lines"
00069          " red. All input images must be of the same size.");
00070 
00071   table
00072         .add(poptmx::NOTE, "ARGUMENTS:")
00073         .add(poptmx::ARGUMENT, &sinogram_name, "sinogram",
00074          "Output image to store the sinogram.", "")
00075         .add(poptmx::ARGUMENT, &inlist, "input images",
00076          "List of the input images.", "")
00077 
00078         .add(poptmx::NOTE, "OPTIONS:")
00079         .add(poptmx::OPTION, &index, 's', "slice",
00080          "Slice index which forms the sinogram.", "")
00081         .add(poptmx::OPTION, &SaveInt,'i', "int",
00082          "Output image(s) as integer.", IntOptionDesc)
00083         .add_standard_options(&beverbose)
00084         .add(poptmx::MAN, "SEE ALSO:", SeeAlsoList);
00085 
00086   if ( ! table.parse(argc,argv) )
00087         exit(0);
00088   if ( ! table.count() ) {
00089         table.usage();
00090         exit(0);
00091   }
00092 
00093   command = table.name();
00094 
00095   // <slice> : required option
00096   if ( ! table.count(&index) )
00097     exit_on_error(command, string () +
00098                                   "Missing required argument: "+table.desc(&index)+".");
00099   // <sinogram> : required argument.
00100   if ( ! table.count(&sinogram_name) )
00101     exit_on_error(command, string () +
00102                                   "Missing required argument: "+table.desc(&sinogram_name)+".");
00103   // List of input files
00104   if ( table.count(&inlist) < 2 )
00105     exit_on_error( command, "Less than 2 input images are specified.");
00106 
00107 }
00108 
00109 
00110 
00111 
00112 
00114 int main(int argc, char *argv[]) {
00115 
00116   const clargs args(argc, argv) ;
00117 
00118   Shape shape = ImageSizes(args.inlist[0]);
00119   int insize=args.inlist.size();
00120   unsigned width=shape(1), hight=shape(0);
00121 
00122   if (args.index >= hight)
00123     exit_on_error(args.command, "Index of the sinogram (" + toString(args.index) +
00124                                   ") is outside the image size (" + toString(hight) + ").");
00125 
00126   Line proj(width);
00127   Map sinogram(insize, width);
00128   ProgressBar bar(args.beverbose, "making sinogram", insize);
00129 
00130   for (int icur = 0; icur < insize ; icur++ ) {
00131     ReadImageLine(args.inlist[icur], proj, (int)args.index, shape);
00132     sinogram(icur, blitz::Range::all() ) = proj;
00133         bar.update();
00134   }
00135 
00136   SaveImage(args.sinogram_name, sinogram, args.SaveInt);
00137 
00138   exit(0);
00139 
00140 }
